trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when you try to perform an invalid operation on a document by using the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试使用 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument" /> 类对文档执行无效操作时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown in the following cases:
trans-unit.target: 在以下情况下，将引发此异常：

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> constructor to open a document that does not already have a customization, and you try to open the document in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>构造函数来打开尚不包含自定义项，并且你的文档尝试在只读模式下打开该文档。

trans-unit.source: If you try to attach a customization to a document by using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.AddCustomization%2A> method, but the document is corrupt or has restricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试通过使用自定义项附加到文档<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.AddCustomization%2A>方法，但文档已损坏或具有受限权限。
